akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general In making grants under section 300ff–51 of this title, the Secretary shall give preference to any qualified applicant experiencing an increase in the burden of providing services regarding HIV/AIDS, as indicated by the factors specified in subsection (b).
(c) Equitable allocations In providing preferences for purposes of subsection (b), the Secretary shall equitably allocate the preferences among urban and rural areas.
